Mortality df for the 19 countries
```{r}
mortality_df = 
  read_csv(
    "./data/mortality.csv") %>%
    relocate(year, .after = region)

countries = c("Nigeria", "Democratic Republic of the Congo", "Uganda","Mozambique", "CÃ´te d'Ivoire", "Niger", "Burkina Faso", "Mali", "Angola", "United Republic of Tanzania", "India", "Ghana", "Cameroon", "Rwanda", "Benin", "Malawi", "Kenya", "Guinea", "Burundi")
```

Cases by parasite species
```{r}

confirm_df = 
  read_xls(
    "./data/reported_cases_by_species.xls", range = "A4:K502") %>% 
  filter(str_detect(
    Year, "P. falciparum|P. vivax"
  )) %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = "2010":"2018",
    names_to = "years",
    values_to = "cases"
  ) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  rename(species = year,
         country = who_region_country_area)
```

```{r, warning=FALSE}
by_country = 
  confirm_df %>% 
  filter(country %in% countries) %>% 
  mutate(  
    species = case_when(
      species == "Total: P. falciparum" ~ "P. falciparum")) %>% 
  drop_na(species)
```

population at risk, estimated cases
```{r, warning=FALSE}

pop_df = 
  read_xls(
    "./data/population_at_risk_estimated_cases_deaths.xls") %>%
  select(1:6) %>%
  rename(
    region = 'Columna1',
    country = 'Columna2',
    year = 'Columna3',
    pop_at_risk = 'Columna4',
    cases_lower = 'Columna5',
    cases_point = 'Columna6'
    ) %>%
  select(-cases_lower) %>%
  relocate(country, .before = region) %>%
  filter(country %in% countries) %>%
  mutate(
    year = as.numeric(year),
    pop_at_risk = as.numeric(pop_at_risk),
    cases_point = as.numeric(cases_point)
  )

pop_df =
      pop_df[-1,]

```

Reported cases by method of confirmation
```{r, warning=FALSE}

rep_cases_df = 
  read_xls(
    "./data/reported_cases_by_method_of_confirmation.xls")

rep_cases_df =
    rep_cases_df[-c(1:4),]

rep_cases_df =
    rep_cases_df %>%
      janitor::row_to_names(row_number = 1) %>%
  janitor::clean_names()
  
  rep_cases =
      rep_cases_df[-1,]
  rep_cases = 
      rep_cases %>%
        pivot_longer(x2000:x2018, names_to = "year", values_to = "cases" ) %>%
  rename(
   country = 'who_region_country_area',
   method = 'na'
   ) %>%
  select(-na_2)
  
```

```{r, warning=FALSE}
rep_cases =
  rep_cases %>%
    mutate(
      country = str_replace(country, "1", ""), 
      year = str_replace(year, "x", ""),
      year = as.numeric(year),
      cases = as.numeric(cases)
    ) %>%
  filter(country %in% countries)
```
